definition: The individual who conducted the survey for this transect
The length of the transect surveyed by the data collector
The tally of juvenile individuals with a total live tissue measurement of 1 to 4 centimeters
The tally of isolates with a total live tissue measurement of 1 to 4 centimters
The tally of individuals with a total live tissue measurement of 5 to 10 centimeters
The tally of individuals with a total live tissue measurement of 11 to 20 centimeters
The tally of individuals with a total live tissue measurement of 21 to 40 centimeters
The tally of individuals with a total live tissue measurement of 41 to 80 centimeters
The tally of individuals with a total live tissue measurement of over 80 centimeters
The tally of individuals with recent total mortality
The number of corals of each species that has evidence of predation
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the data.
Maximum diameter across longest axis of the entire colony, including dead skeleton
Maximum height of coral measured perpendicular to substrate
Estimated percent mortality, including old mortality unrelated to the observed condition
The condition of the sample, including TL (tissue loss), CLP (color loss – paling), CLB (color loss – bleaching), D (discoloration), GA (growth anomaly)
Estimated percent affected by the condition in percentage bins: A (0-5%), B (6-50%), C (51-95%), D (96-100%). For tissue loss, percent affected refers to recent mortality.
Distribution of the condition on the individual: F (focal), MF (multifocal), D (diffuse), or W (whole colony)
For tissue loss only, describe the rate of progression as A (acute, clean skeleton >2cm) or SA (subacute, clean skeleton <2cm)
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the data.
The total length of the chain before it is laid out on the reef
The starting mark of the chain on the transect tape, in centimeters (0, 1000, 2000, 3000, 4000)
The end position on the transect tape of the chain laid out, in centimeters
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the data.
